Validate that a `*record` is correctly formated

Source: R/ntspRecord-validation.R
validateRecord.Rd

Checks are run for conisitency and the files are present on disc.

Usage

validateRecord(record)

# S3 method for class 'msrawfilesRecord'
validateRecord(record)

# S3 method for class 'featureRecord'
validateRecord(record)
